Reference

Shiny interface

Most users will only need to use this function.

specify_graph()

Shiny interface to specify network structure and compute bounds

causaloptim-package

causaloptim: An Interface to Specify Causal Graphs and Compute Balke Bounds

Direct interface

Functions for creating and interacting with Balke’s program.

analyze_graph()

Analyze the causal graph to determine constraints and objective

optimize_effect()

Run the Balke optimizer

interpret_bounds()

Convert bounds string to a function

simulate_bounds()

Simulate bounds

latex_bounds()

Latex bounds equations

Utilities

Internal functions

plot_graphres()

Plot the analyzed graph object

symb.subtract()

Symbolic subtraction

parse_effect()

Parse text that defines a causal effect

shortentxt()

Shorten strings to 80 characters wide
